mapper.select: SELECT board_sn, user_name AS userName, title, content, b.created_dt AS createdDt FROM board b JOIN user u ON b.user_sn = u.user_sn WHERE board_yn = 'Y' ORDER BY b.created_dt DESC
SELECT gongo_sn, gongo_name, gongo_type, schedule_start_dt, schedule_end_dt, document_start_dt, document_end_dt, use_yn, created_dt, updated_dt FROM gongo WHERE use_yn = 'Y' ORDER BY gongo_sn DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board ( user_sn, title, content, board_yn, created_dt, updated_dt ) VALUES ( #{userSn}, #{title}, #{content}, 'Y', NOW(), NOW() )
